Hello,
Hirotada Tokugawa (M) added a fact sheet about Matsudaira Katamori
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/katamorifacts1.htm
please check it out....if there are any comments/corrections and 
suggestions about anything please contact shinsengumihq(a)yahoo.com

------------------------------------------------------
[Off-Topic] *for new members who have never read one of my film 
rants before*
I highly recommend the Christmas movie TOKYO GODFATHERS (on dvd 
available at Blockbuster) from the same diretor of PERFECT BLUE and 
***MILLENIUM ACTRESS*** (contains Shinsengumi cameo AND the 2nd disk 
shows a Shinsengumi cosplayer they used as a model AND starring RK 
Saitou's voice actor Hiroaki Suzuoki AND animates Boshin War art).

***MILLENIUM ACTRESS*** basically takes you on a tour of Japanese 
history via film...and plenty of inside jokes for people who love 
chambara....film made me cry...

yes I know from the title TOKYO GODFATHERS it doesn't sound like a 
Christmas movie...but trust me it IS a great film for the holidays 
and deserves alot of attention...all 3 OUTSTANDING films by the 
director Satoshi Kon...please do yourself a favor and view these 
great works

lastly
if you haven't already seen this...
http://www.livejournal.com/users/ito_kashitaro/10143.html
Shimada Kai would've loved these Shinsen-cookies
